ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews Mike Dyson the Boxing King!; Adjustments; Blunder Years; Thrasher Magazine!; One Day in Africa; 50/50; Handbook for Scaring People!; Martyred with Children; A Cracked Look at Robin Hood; Flying Carpet; Monster Olympic One-Shots; Suds McFrenzie; Wonderland Revisited; Spittlejuice; One Day at the Ad Agency; A Cracked Look at Robin Hood
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini try to escape on a flying carpet but a trio of beautiful women lead them back to the prison.
Monsters compete in the Olympics.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:37:51. [Issue ID 250600]
